languages.text: {n}Хруст костей, вопли несчастного, злобные смешки блюстителя воскрешают и в вашей памяти картины {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}собственных мучений{/d}. Слишком ярко, слишком болезненно.{/n}

{n}The sound of breaking bones, the man's cries, and the enforcer's hateful laughter remind you of what {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}you went through{/d} yourself. Too vividly, and too painfully.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хруст костей, вопли несчастного, злобные смешки блюстителя воскрешают и в вашей памяти картины {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}собственных мучений{/d}. Слишком ярко, слишком болезненно.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Geräusch brechender Knochen, die Schreie des Mannes und das hasserfüllte Lachen des Enforcers erinnert dich daran, was {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}du selbst ertragen musstest{/d}. Zu lebendig und zu schmerzhaft.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sound of breaking bones, the man's cries, and the enforcer's hateful laughter remind you of what {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}you went through{/d} yourself. Too vividly, and too painfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Geräusch brechender Knochen, die Schreie des Mannes und das hasserfüllte Lachen des Enforcers erinnert dich daran, was {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}du selbst ertragen musstest{/d}. Zu lebendig und zu schmerzhaft.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le craquement des os, les cris de l'homme et le rire haineux du prévôt vous rappellent ce que {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}vous avez vous-même vécu{/d}. Un souvenir trop vif et trop douloureux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sound of breaking bones, the man's cries, and the enforcer's hateful laughter remind you of what {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}you went through{/d} yourself. Too vividly, and too painfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le craquement des os, les cris de l'homme et le rire haineux du prévôt vous rappellent ce que {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}vous avez vous-même vécu{/d}. Un souvenir trop vif et trop douloureux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El crujido de los huesos al romperse, los alaridos del hombre y las furiosas carcajadas del guardia te recuerdan lo que tú {mf|mismo|misma} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}padeciste{/d}. El recuerdo es demasiado vívido y demasiado doloroso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sound of breaking bones, the man's cries, and the enforcer's hateful laughter remind you of what {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}you went through{/d} yourself. Too vividly, and too painfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El crujido de los huesos al romperse, los alaridos del hombre y las furiosas carcajadas del guardia te recuerdan lo que tú {mf|mismo|misma} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}padeciste{/d}. El recuerdo es demasiado vívido y demasiado doloroso.{/n}

languages.text: {n}骨の折れる音、男の叫び声、エンフォーサーの憎悪に満ちた笑い声が、かつて{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}自らが経験した{/d}ことを思い出させる。あまりにも鮮明に、痛みを伴って。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sound of breaking bones, the man's cries, and the enforcer's hateful laughter remind you of what {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}you went through{/d} yourself. Too vividly, and too painfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}骨の折れる音、男の叫び声、エンフォーサーの憎悪に満ちた笑い声が、かつて{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}自らが経験した{/d}ことを思い出させる。あまりにも鮮明に、痛みを伴って。{/n}

languages.text: {n}骨头折断的声音，男人的哭喊声，还有执法者可恶的笑声，这一切都让你回想起了你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}亲身经历{/d}过的事情。如此生动，如此痛苦。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sound of breaking bones, the man's cries, and the enforcer's hateful laughter remind you of what {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}you went through{/d} yourself. Too vividly, and too painfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}骨头折断的声音，男人的哭喊声，还有执法者可恶的笑声，这一切都让你回想起了你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}亲身经历{/d}过的事情。如此生动，如此痛苦。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kırılan kemiklerin sesi, adamın haykırışları ve infazcının nefret edilesi kahkahası; sana {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}daha önce başına gelenleri{/d} hatırlatıyor. Tüm canlılığıyla, tüm acısıyla hatırlıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sound of breaking bones, the man's cries, and the enforcer's hateful laughter remind you of what {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}you went through{/d} yourself. Too vividly, and too painfully.{/n}
